/**
 * The function is outputting an object of the wizard tabs with the inputs
 * that are not in the undo array so the programmer will know if he need to add them
 * to the undo array
 */
function checkUndoSupport() {
    // get objects
    var undoFields = tryParseJSON(Wizard.getUndoFields());
    var tabs = {};
    // get all fields
    $.each($('#wizardForm .tab-content > .tab-pane'), function( index, tab ) {
        // if the tab don't have id skip it
        if ( !tab.id ) return;
        // get object
        var $tab = $(tab);
        // when the tab don't have representation in the object create new one
        if ( !tabs[tab.id] ) tabs[tab.id] = {
            inputs: Array()
        };
        // push the inputs to the tab
        $.each($tab.find('[name]'), function( index, input ) {
            tabs[tab.id].inputs.push(input.name);
        });
    });
    // now remove all inputs from the tab object that are already in the undo
    $.each(tabs, function( index, tab ) {
        // remove inputs that are in the undo
        for (var i = 0; i < tab.inputs.length; i++) {
            if ( typeof undoFields[tab.inputs[i]] != 'undefined' ) {
                //
                delete tab.inputs[i];
            }
        }
        // after deleting we need to reset the array keys
        tab.inputs = tab.inputs.filter(function( input ) {
            return typeof input != 'undefined';
        });
    });
    // print result of fields that are not in undo
    console.group('Not In Undo');
    console.log(tabs);
    console.groupEnd();
}

</script>

function redirectOldBrowserToUpgrade() {
    //https://github.com/bestiejs/platform.js/

    /*
    console.log(platform.name);
    console.log(platform.version);
    console.log(platform.product);
    console.log(platform.os);
    */

    // We make sure the platform object is defined before we use it
    if ( !platform ) return;

    // Make sure we don't use it in the upgrade browser page so we don't have unlimited refresh
    if (platform.name === null || window.location.href.indexOf('login/upgrade_browser.php') !== -1) {
        return;
    }

    // Add extra data to the tracking errors
    if (window.TrackJS) {
        trackJs.addMetadata("platformName",platform.name);
        trackJs.addMetadata("platformVersion",platform.version);
        trackJs.addMetadata("platformOS",platform.os);
    }

    var p_version = (platform.version !== null) ? platform.version.toString().split(".")[0] : '0';

    if (platform.name=='Safari' && (p_version=='5' || p_version=='6')) {
        window.location.replace("/manager/login/upgrade_browser.php");
    }
}

    /**
     * The function convert special characters to HTML entities, we use it when
     * we add strings into HTML attributes, it used to prevent the breaks in 
     * the HTML e.g. title="abc"efg".
     * 
     * Source: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1787322/htmlspecialchars-equivalent-in-javascript
     */
    function escapeHtml_footer(text) {
      
      if ( !text ) return text;

      var map = {
        '&': '&amp;',
        '<': '&lt;',
        '>': '&gt;',
        '"': '&quot;',
        "'": '&apos;'
      };
      return text.toString().replace( /[&<>"']/g, function( m ) { return map[m]; } );
    }


    //https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2264072/detect-a-finger-swipe-through-javascript-on-the-iphone-and-android
    //https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2915833/how-to-check-browser-for-touchstart-support-using-js-jquery
    /*
    if ('ontouchstart' in document.documentElement) {
        document.addEventListener('touchstart', handleTouchStart, false);        
        document.addEventListener('touchmove', handleTouchMove, false);
    }

    var xDown = null;                                                        
    var yDown = null;
    */

    function getTouches(evt) {
      return evt.touches ||             // browser API
             evt.originalEvent.touches; // jQuery
    }                                                     

    function handleTouchStart(evt) {                                         
        xDown = getTouches(evt)[0].clientX;                                      
        yDown = getTouches(evt)[0].clientY;                                      
    }

    function handleTouchMove(evt) {
        if ( ! xDown || ! yDown ) {
            return;
        }

        var xUp = evt.touches[0].clientX;                                    
        var yUp = evt.touches[0].clientY;

        var xDiff = xDown - xUp;
        var yDiff = yDown - yUp;

        if ( Math.abs( xDiff ) > Math.abs( yDiff ) ) {/*most significant*/
            if ( xDiff > 0 ) {
                /* left swipe */
                alert('left swipe:' + xDiff);
                //Run the browser forward
                window.history.forward();
            } else {
                /* right swipe */
                //alert('right swipe:' + xDiff);
                //Run the browser back
                window.history.back();
            }                       
        } else {
            if ( yDiff > 0 ) {
                /* up swipe */ 
            } else { 
                /* down swipe */
            }                                                                 
        }
        /* reset values */
        xDown = null;
        yDown = null;                                             
    }

<script>
var showChatForUser = true;
jQuery(function($) {
    $('#callUsWindow').on('show.bs.modal', function ( event ) {
        var button = $(event.relatedTarget);
        var language = button.data('language');

        switch(language) {
            case 'fr':
                var calendlyURL = 'https://calendly.com/site123-julien-french/15min';
                break;
            case 'es':
                var calendlyURL = 'https://calendly.com/site123-spanish/15min-1';
                break;
            case 'pt':
                var calendlyURL = 'https://calendly.com/site123-portuguese/15min';
                break;
            case 'he':
                var calendlyURL = 'https://calendly.com/site123-hebrew/15min';
                break;
            default:
                var calendlyURL = 'https://calendly.com/site123-sales/15min';
        }

        //Flag that this customer click on the phone button
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: "/manager/flag_UserClickPhoneNumber.php"
        });

        //Show the window
        var x = '<div class="calendly-inline-widget" data-url="'+calendlyURL+'?hide_event_type_details=1&hide_gdpr_banner=1&back=1&month='+calendly_GetTodayDate_month()+'&date='+calendly_GetTodayDate()+'&full_name=Professor%20Emilson%20Cardoso%20Moreira&email=professoremilsoncardosomoreira%40gmail.com" style="min-width:320px;height:630px;"></div><script type="text/javascript" src="https://assets.calendly.com/assets/external/widget.js" async>';
        x += '</';
        x += 'script>';
        $('#callUsWindow_content').html(x);
    });

    $('.help247window').click(function() {

        if (showChatForUser==true) {

            if (typeof Intercom !== 'undefined') {
                Intercom('show');
            }
        
        } else {

            //If Intercom send us message we first show Intercom window and not our message
            if ($('.forceIntercom').length>0) {
                if (typeof Intercom !== 'undefined') {
                    Intercom('showMessages');
                }
            } else {
                //We show our support window
                $('.helpBOX-popup').show(100);
            }  
            $('.help247window').hide(function() {
                $('.help247close').show(100); 
            });  

        }
    });
    $('.help247close').click(function() {
        if (typeof Intercom !== 'undefined') {
            Intercom('hide');
        }
        CloseAllHelpCenterWindows();
    });
    $('.intercomButton').click(function() {
        if (typeof Intercom !== 'undefined') {
            Intercom('show');
        }
    });

    // Chat upgrade alert
    $('.popScoreFreeSupport').click(function() {
        // secure objects
        if ( typeof topWindow == 'undefined' || typeof topWindow.bootbox == 'undefined' ) return;
        // wizard only - disable the leave pop-up alert message
        topWindow.disableLeavePopup = true;
        // alert the user about that he need to upgrade to get a chat support
        topWindow.bootbox.confirm({
            title: "Atualize seu site para obter suporte ao chat ao vivo!",
            message: "Voc\u00ea pode continuar usando o seu site gratuitamente, mas voc\u00ea precisa atualizar para desfrutar de suporte gratuito ao chat ao vivo para sempre.",
            buttons: {
                confirm: {
                    label: "Atualize Agora",
                    className: 'btn-success'
                },
                cancel: {
                    label: "Talvez mais tarde",
                    className: 'btn-link'
                }
            },
            callback: function( confirm ) {
                // check if the user confirm clicks
                if ( confirm ) {
                                        window.location.href = "/manager/upgrade/index.php?w=8289962";
                                    }
            }
        });
    });

});

function calendly_GetTodayDate() {
    var today = new Date();
    var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
    var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0!
    var yyyy = today.getFullYear();

    today = yyyy + '-' + mm + '-' + dd;

    return today;
}

function calendly_GetTodayDate_month() {
    var today = new Date();
    var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
    var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0!
    var yyyy = today.getFullYear();

    today = yyyy + '-' + mm;

    return today;
}

function FixIntercomRTL() {
    if ($('html[dir=rtl]').length>0) {
        setTimeout(function() {
            $('.intercom-messenger-frame').attr('style','left: 20px !important;right: auto !important;');
        },50);
        setTimeout(function() {
            $('.intercom-messenger-frame').attr('style','left: 20px !important;right: auto !important;');
        },300);
    }
}

function CloseAllHelpCenterWindows() {
    //Remove the class that force this window
    $('.help247window').removeClass('forceIntercom');
    $('.helpBOX-popup').hide(100);
    $('.help247close').hide(function() {
        $('.help247window').show(100); 
    });
}
</script>
